member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable persistently sending WM_MOUSEMOVE messages to the IE window during a mouse hover.

member.name: P:Liberator.Driver.Preferences.InternetExplorer.EnsureCleanSession
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to clear the Internet Explorer cache before launching the browser. When set to true, clears the system cache for all instances of Internet Explorer, even those already running when the driven instance is launched. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Liberator.Driver.Preferences.InternetExplorer.ForceCreateProcessApi
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to force the use of the Windows CreateProcess API when launching Internet Explorer. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Liberator.Driver.Preferences.InternetExplorer.ForceShellWindowsApi
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to force the use of the Windows ShellWindows API when attaching to Internet Explorer. The default value is false.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to ignore the zoom level of Internet Explorer .
